results.description: This gift of life will plant 144 trees and offset an avg. carbon footprint for 12 months.

admin.title: Climate action
admin.description:
Give the gift of long-lasting climate action. All gifts include tree planting and carbon offsets via our highly certified humanitarian and biodiversity protection projects.

  • Offset an average 3, 6 or 12 month carbon footprint
  • Plant 12 trees per month
  • Support the highest verified climate solutions, like protecting the Amazon Rainforest. All projects are aligned with the United Nations SDGs
  • Plant trees in Madagascar, Mozambique and Nicaragua
  • Get monthly updates and newsletters
  • All impact visible on the recipients own virtual forest
  • Easy to action tips on how to live a more sustainable life

results.description: This gift of 100,000 trees will create a forest big enough to be seen from space. Think 4 times the amount of trees in Central Park!

admin.title: Tree planting
